questions.question: CAPTAIN : SHIP :: COMMANDER : ____
questions.explanation: A captain leads a ship; a commander leads a unit.

questions.question: LOUD : QUIET :: BRIGHT : ____
questions.explanation: Loud is the opposite of quiet; bright is the opposite of dim.

questions.question: STUDENT : LEARN :: ATHLETE : ____
questions.explanation: Students learn; athletes train.

questions.question: PILOT : COCKPIT :: DRIVER : ____
questions.explanation: A pilot sits in a cockpit; a driver sits in a cab.

questions.question: KEY : LOCK :: PASSWORD : ____
questions.explanation: A key opens a lock; a password unlocks an account.

questions.question: MAP : DIRECTIONS :: CLOCK : ____
questions.explanation: A map shows directions; a clock shows time.

questions.question: FINGER : HAND :: TOE : ____
questions.explanation: Fingers are part of the hand; toes are part of the foot.

questions.question: SWORD : SOLDIER :: WRENCH : ____
questions.explanation: A sword is used by a soldier; a wrench is used by a mechanic.

questions.question: WINTER : COLD :: SUMMER : ____
questions.explanation: Winter is cold; summer is hot.

questions.question: ENGINE : CAR :: HEART : ____
questions.explanation: The engine powers a car; the heart powers the body.

questions.question: LIBRARIAN : BOOKS :: CHEF : ____
questions.explanation: Librarians manage books; chefs work with food.

questions.question: RULER : MEASURE :: SCALE : ____
questions.explanation: A ruler measures length; a scale measures weight.

questions.question: RAIN : CLOUDS :: WAVES : ____
questions.explanation: Rain comes from clouds; waves come from the ocean.

questions.question: PAPER : WRITE :: SCREEN : ____
questions.explanation: You write on paper; you view a display on a screen.

questions.question: SLEEP : NIGHT :: WORK : ____
questions.explanation: We often sleep at night; we often work during the day.

questions.question: BRIDGE : RIVER :: TUNNEL : ____
questions.explanation: A bridge goes over a river; a tunnel goes through a mountain.

questions.question: ARTIST : PAINTING :: WRITER : ____
questions.explanation: An artist creates a painting; a writer creates a story.

questions.question: HELMET : HEAD :: GOGGLES : ____
questions.explanation: A helmet protects the head; goggles protect the eyes.

questions.question: CLOCK : TIME :: THERMOMETER : ____
questions.explanation: A clock measures time; a thermometer measures temperature.

questions.question: QUESTION : ANSWER :: PROBLEM : ____
questions.explanation: A question is followed by an answer; a problem is followed by a solution.

questions.question: FREEZE : COLD :: BOIL : ____
questions.explanation: Things freeze when very cold; they boil when very hot.

questions.question: COMMANDER : ORDER :: JUDGE : ____
questions.explanation: A commander gives an order; a judge gives a verdict.

questions.question: PLANE : FLY :: TANK : ____
questions.explanation: Planes fly; tanks drive.

questions.question: LOCK : PROTECT :: PASSWORD : ____
questions.explanation: A lock protects something; a password secures something.

questions.question: BASE : MILITARY :: CAMPUS : ____
questions.explanation: A base is for the military; a campus is for a college.
